cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with sequential decision making and learning algorithms, which are topics that are commonly studied in the sub-fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses combinatorial decision tasks, which are relevant to the sub-field of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The use of potential functions and tuning parameters suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-field of game theory (cs.GT) and information theory (cs.IT).
